channel.title: Disconnecting bugged player null?
channel.description:
Hi, My server has a bit of a problem, I don't think anyone can connect to my server due to this error in the picture below [IMG]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/8916/servererrorf.jpg[/img]
I am able to connect to it, but I none of my friends are around to be able to have a go at logging on. I have also tried replacing the playerhandler.java & .class with no success. I'm going to leave the server console running so if you want to try and connect, the ip is: shazscape.sytes.net & the port is 43594
Thanks in advance

item.title: Disconnecting bugged player null?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“johno2, post:6, topic:280481”][quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=370477.msg2800149#msg2800149 date=1243335453]
Remove your ip. No advertising.
[/quote]

FFS… I think ‘advertising’ is getting over the top now… He needs some help… If your not going to offer help, or just flame to “increase” your post count, then go do it somewhere else…[/quote]

I’m sorry that he’s breaking the rules. You aren’t allowed to post it because it’s considered advertising. Whenever I ask for help I don’t include my ip. Also, my post count? I honestly don’t know my post count. That doesn’t matter.

Read full topic

item.title: Disconnecting bugged player null?
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

I had this problem, it’s usually because of a null (item) It’s recognised in client, but not serve, if i was you i would delete everyone’s items in account, or just whole account.
I hope this helps
~Johno

Read full topic
